title: League of Legends Client Won't Open
body: Today my League of Legends client would just say "Authenticating" whenever I tried to sign in. It would say Authenticating for a very long time and just not open. I tried re-installing and running in administrator but nothing works. After re-installing my client won't even open. It would just show the League of Legends logo for a split second and close. Everything was fine before. Does anyone know how to fix this?

replies.body: I'm glad you tried some steps to troubleshoot this, but running as admin is good for game file permissions but not so much your network.  This error is usually caused by a network block or instability that is struggling to reach the authentication server.  For your specific issue, the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help resolve things.
Thank you so much <3. I fixed my internet problems and got my client to work.
